articles.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
articles.summary: In urothelial carcinoma, specific gut microbes can enhance immunotherapy effectiveness by boosting the immune system's ability to fight cancer.

articles.title: Effects of estradiol, tamoxifen, and raloxifene on human temporal lobe cortex astroglial cell spreading.
articles.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

Estrogen-related compounds differently affect how brain support cells (astrocytes) spread, potentially influencing neural communication and brain health.
